Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.App
  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    -------------- Informatics Large practial (ILP): Coursework 2 -------------- Program to create a flightpath and fly imaginary drone round the Edinburgh University campua collecting sensor readings and avoiding obstacles. Algorithms Utilised: 1) Christofides (TSP): for aproximation of an effient sensor circuit tour 2) A* Search: for generating routes between sensors avoiding buildings 2.1) A* Heuristic: distance (incliding round obstalcle) to target.
    Author:
